varValue.code:
return {
  nome: variables['4214fe39-f1cd-47cf-bdb2-4b03990a131e'].aluno_nome || 'Nome Completo do Aluno',
  email: variables['4214fe39-f1cd-47cf-bdb2-4b03990a131e'].email || 'aluno.email@dominio.com',
  telefone: variables['4214fe39-f1cd-47cf-bdb2-4b03990a131e'].telefone || '(11) 98765-4321',
  curso: variables['4214fe39-f1cd-47cf-bdb2-4b03990a131e'].curso || 'Engenharia de Software',
  semestre: variables['4214fe39-f1cd-47cf-bdb2-4b03990a131e'].semestre || '4º Semestre',
  turma: variables['4214fe39-f1cd-47cf-bdb2-4b03990a131e'].turma || 'ES4A',
  ra: variables['4214fe39-f1cd-47cf-bdb2-4b03990a131e'].ra || '12345678'
}
